texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Government  Notifications

texts.label: text
texts.orig: CONSTITUTION   OF   THE   DEMOCRATIC   SOCIALIST   REPUBLIC   OF   SRI   LANKA
texts.text: CONSTITUTION   OF   THE   DEMOCRATIC   SOCIALIST   REPUBLIC   OF   SRI   LANKA

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Notification
texts.text: Notification

texts.label: text
texts.orig: IT is hereby notified that the notification issued by me in the exercise of powers vested in me under Articles 44 (1), 45 (1) and 47 (1) (a) (b) respectively of the Constitution of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka and published in the Gazette Extraordinary No. 2187/27 of 09th August, 2020 and amended by time to time, is further amended with effect from July 07, 2021 in the manner set out below.
texts.text: IT is hereby notified that the notification issued by me in the exercise of powers vested in me under Articles 44 (1), 45 (1) and 47 (1) (a) (b) respectively of the Constitution of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka and published in the Gazette Extraordinary No. 2187/27 of 09th August, 2020 and amended by time to time, is further amended with effect from July 07, 2021 in the manner set out below.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: GOTABAYA RAJAPAKSA, President.
texts.text: GOTABAYA RAJAPAKSA, President.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Presidential Secretariat, Colombo 01, July 07,  2021.
texts.text: Presidential Secretariat, Colombo 01, July 07,  2021.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: 1A
texts.text: 1A

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (1) By deleting the Heading 'No. 3.0 Minister of Finance and  '01. Purview, 02.  Subjects & Functions, 03. Special Priorities and 04. Related Institutional  and Legal Framework' under thereof in that notification;
texts.text: (1) By deleting the Heading 'No. 3.0 Minister of Finance and  '01. Purview, 02.  Subjects & Functions, 03. Special Priorities and 04. Related Institutional  and Legal Framework' under thereof in that notification;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (2) 'By insertion of the following new Heading and '01. Purview, 02. Subjects and Functions, 03. Special Priorities and 04. Related Institutional and Legal Framework' under thereof after the Heading No. '2.1 State Minister of Digital Technology and Enterprise Development' in that notification;
texts.text: (2) 'By insertion of the following new Heading and '01. Purview, 02. Subjects and Functions, 03. Special Priorities and 04. Related Institutional and Legal Framework' under thereof after the Heading No. '2.1 State Minister of Digital Technology and Enterprise Development' in that notification;

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: 3.0 Minister of Economic Policies & Plan Implementation
texts.text: 3.0 Minister of Economic Policies & Plan Implementation

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: 01. Purview
texts.text: 01. Purview

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Planning and implementation of relevant policies, in order to accelerate economic development and social progress based on the National Policy Statement: 'Vistas of Prosperity and Splendour'.
texts.text: Planning and implementation of relevant policies, in order to accelerate economic development and social progress based on the National Policy Statement: 'Vistas of Prosperity and Splendour'.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: 02. Subjects and Functions
texts.text: 02. Subjects and Functions

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 1. Formulating policies in relation to the subject of economic policies and plan implementation  in conformity , with the prescribed Laws, Acts and Ordinances, implementation of projects under the national budget, state Investment and National Development Programme, and formulating, implementing, monitoring and evaluating policies, programmes and projects, related to subjects and functions under below-mentioned State Corporations and Statutory Institutions for 'economic policies & plan implementation' based on the  national  policies  implemented by the government, and in accordance with the policy statement 'Vistas of Prosperity and Splendour'.
texts.text: 1. Formulating policies in relation to the subject of economic policies and plan implementation  in conformity , with the prescribed Laws, Acts and Ordinances, implementation of projects under the national budget, state Investment and National Development Programme, and formulating, implementing, monitoring and evaluating policies, programmes and projects, related to subjects and functions under below-mentioned State Corporations and Statutory Institutions for 'economic policies & plan implementation' based on the  national  policies  implemented by the government, and in accordance with the policy statement 'Vistas of Prosperity and Splendour'.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 2. Facilitating of carrying out relevant development activities while coordinating all ministries with the Presidential Task Force for Economic Revival and Poverty Alleviation and the Presidential Task Force for transform Sri Lanka into a Green Socio economy with Sustainable Solutions for Climate Changes.
texts.text: 2. Facilitating of carrying out relevant development activities while coordinating all ministries with the Presidential Task Force for Economic Revival and Poverty Alleviation and the Presidential Task Force for transform Sri Lanka into a Green Socio economy with Sustainable Solutions for Climate Changes.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 3. Coordinating with the Presidential Task Force for Gama Samaga Pilisandara Rural Development.
texts.text: 3. Coordinating with the Presidential Task Force for Gama Samaga Pilisandara Rural Development.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 4. Monitoring and reviewing the cost of living and the flow of goods and services among the community of consumer, making periodic requests to the Cabinet Committee on Cost of Living to ensure that consumers as well as local producers and suppliers to receive goods and services at the reasonable prices.
texts.text: 4. Monitoring and reviewing the cost of living and the flow of goods and services among the community of consumer, making periodic requests to the Cabinet Committee on Cost of Living to ensure that consumers as well as local producers and suppliers to receive goods and services at the reasonable prices.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 5. Implementing people-centric development activities by coordinating the development activities of District and Divisional Development Committees and Provincial Councils.
texts.text: 5. Implementing people-centric development activities by coordinating the development activities of District and Divisional Development Committees and Provincial Councils.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: 03. Special  Priorities
texts.text: 03. Special  Priorities

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 1. Formulation and implementation of national development programmes and projects to achieve the sustainable  development goals in accordance with the Policy Statement; 'Vistas of Prosperity and Splendour'
texts.text: 1. Formulation and implementation of national development programmes and projects to achieve the sustainable  development goals in accordance with the Policy Statement; 'Vistas of Prosperity and Splendour'

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 2. Formulation of national policies
texts.text: 2. Formulation of national policies

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 3. Co-ordination of State, Private and Co-operative sectors for facilitating the private sector participation in economic development
texts.text: 3. Co-ordination of State, Private and Co-operative sectors for facilitating the private sector participation in economic development

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 4. Implementation of rural and regional economic development policies and strategies.
texts.text: 4. Implementation of rural and regional economic development policies and strategies.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 5. Co-ordination of all Ministries and other relevant institutions for directing the infrastructure development, investment promotion, regulation of organic fertilizer  production  and  other  Government  flagship development programmes towards the expected goals.
texts.text: 5. Co-ordination of all Ministries and other relevant institutions for directing the infrastructure development, investment promotion, regulation of organic fertilizer  production  and  other  Government  flagship development programmes towards the expected goals.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 6. Take necessary measures to consolidate International Banks, funds and local Banks to uplift the rural and regional economy while strengthening grass root level network of service delivery network.
texts.text: 6. Take necessary measures to consolidate International Banks, funds and local Banks to uplift the rural and regional economy while strengthening grass root level network of service delivery network.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (03) The Heading 'No. 5.1 State Minister of Urban Development, Coast Conservation, Waste  Disposal and Community Cleanliness' and '01. Subjects and Functions,  02.  Special Priorities and 03. Related Institutional and Legal Framework' under thereof in that notification is as follows;
texts.text: (03) The Heading 'No. 5.1 State Minister of Urban Development, Coast Conservation, Waste  Disposal and Community Cleanliness' and '01. Subjects and Functions,  02.  Special Priorities and 03. Related Institutional and Legal Framework' under thereof in that notification is as follows;

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: 5.1 State Minister of Urban Development, Waste Disposal and Community Cleanliness
texts.text: 5.1 State Minister of Urban Development, Waste Disposal and Community Cleanliness

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: 01. Subjects and Functions
texts.text: 01. Subjects and Functions

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Assisting in the formulation of policies in relation to the subject of Urban Development, Waste Disposal and Community Cleanliness  for the creation of 'Modern Cities and Clean Country' under the direction and guidance of the Minister of Urban Development and Housing in conformity with the prescribed Laws, Acts and Ordinances and implementing, projects under the National Budget, State Investment and National Development Programme, and implementing, monitoring and evaluating subjects and functions of the below-mentioned Departments, State Corporations and Statutory Organizations.
texts.text: Assisting in the formulation of policies in relation to the subject of Urban Development, Waste Disposal and Community Cleanliness  for the creation of 'Modern Cities and Clean Country' under the direction and guidance of the Minister of Urban Development and Housing in conformity with the prescribed Laws, Acts and Ordinances and implementing, projects under the National Budget, State Investment and National Development Programme, and implementing, monitoring and evaluating subjects and functions of the below-mentioned Departments, State Corporations and Statutory Organizations.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: 02. Special Priorities
texts.text: 02. Special Priorities

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 1. Socially empowering urban labour force by development of fully-fledged housing complexes for shanty dwellers and low income recipients
texts.text: 1. Socially empowering urban labour force by development of fully-fledged housing complexes for shanty dwellers and low income recipients

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 2. Coordinating the provision of long term credit facilities for construction of housing complexes with modern amenities for middle income recipients in Colombo and suburbs
texts.text: 2. Coordinating the provision of long term credit facilities for construction of housing complexes with modern amenities for middle income recipients in Colombo and suburbs

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 3. Flood control and provision of urban vehicle parks, shopping complexes, fitness centres, entertainment facilities
texts.text: 3. Flood control and provision of urban vehicle parks, shopping complexes, fitness centres, entertainment facilities

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 4. Replacement of old storied buildings by new storied buildings
texts.text: 4. Replacement of old storied buildings by new storied buildings

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 5. Providing new houses for urban shanty dwellers via urban housing schemes and community facilities
texts.text: 5. Providing new houses for urban shanty dwellers via urban housing schemes and community facilities

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 6. Provision of new housing projects and credit facilities to resolve housing problems of the middle class families
texts.text: 6. Provision of new housing projects and credit facilities to resolve housing problems of the middle class families

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 7. Introducing storied housing schemes on reasonable rental basis for those seeking temporary residency on rent basis
texts.text: 7. Introducing storied housing schemes on reasonable rental basis for those seeking temporary residency on rent basis

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 8. Incentivizing investors in launching new housing projects by providing lands at concessionary prices to  housing  construction  companies
texts.text: 8. Incentivizing investors in launching new housing projects by providing lands at concessionary prices to  housing  construction  companies

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 9. Introducing urban forest gardens, urban and suburban parks, water parks and green stretches on either side of the roads
texts.text: 9. Introducing urban forest gardens, urban and suburban parks, water parks and green stretches on either side of the roads

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 10. Introducing an efficient mechanism for the management of urban waste and sewerage and establishing a methodology for recycling water
texts.text: 10. Introducing an efficient mechanism for the management of urban waste and sewerage and establishing a methodology for recycling water

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 11. Adopting measures to prevent haphazard disposal of waste by installing waste disposal yards and sanitary waste holdings jointly with several local government bodies
texts.text: 11. Adopting measures to prevent haphazard disposal of waste by installing waste disposal yards and sanitary waste holdings jointly with several local government bodies

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 12. Formulating legal methodologies for the disposal of hospital and factory waste in accordance with the disposal of technical and electronic waste
texts.text: 12. Formulating legal methodologies for the disposal of hospital and factory waste in accordance with the disposal of technical and electronic waste

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 13. Adopting measures to prevent the disposal of waste in an irresponsible manner
texts.text: 13. Adopting measures to prevent the disposal of waste in an irresponsible manner

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 14. Formulating a programme to regulate all urban construction in term of urban development plans
texts.text: 14. Formulating a programme to regulate all urban construction in term of urban development plans

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 15. It is a basic feature of all urban construction projects to provide for vehicle parks and access facilities for the disable people.
texts.text: 15. It is a basic feature of all urban construction projects to provide for vehicle parks and access facilities for the disable people.

texts.orig: 03. Related Institutional and Legal Framework
texts.text: 03. Related Institutional and Legal Framework

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (4) 'By insertion of the following new Heading and '01. Subjects and Functions, 02. Special Priorities and 03. Related Institutional and Legal Framework' under thereof after the Heading No. '5.3 State Minister of Estate Houses and Community Infrastructure' in that notification;
texts.text: (4) 'By insertion of the following new Heading and '01. Subjects and Functions, 02. Special Priorities and 03. Related Institutional and Legal Framework' under thereof after the Heading No. '5.3 State Minister of Estate Houses and Community Infrastructure' in that notification;

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: 5.4 State Minister of Coast Conservation & Low-Lying Lands Development
texts.text: 5.4 State Minister of Coast Conservation & Low-Lying Lands Development

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: 01. Subjects and Functions
texts.text: 01. Subjects and Functions

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Assisting in the formulation of policies in relation to the subject of Coast Conservation & Low-Lying Lands Development  for the creation of 'Protection of Marine Resources and Law-Lying Lands Development' under the direction and guidance of the Minister of Urban Development and Housing in conformity with the prescribed Laws, Acts and Ordinances and implementing, projects under the National Budget, State Investment and National Development Programme, and implementing, monitoring and evaluating subjects and functions of the below-mentioned Departments, State Corporations and Statutory Organizations.
texts.text: Assisting in the formulation of policies in relation to the subject of Coast Conservation & Low-Lying Lands Development  for the creation of 'Protection of Marine Resources and Law-Lying Lands Development' under the direction and guidance of the Minister of Urban Development and Housing in conformity with the prescribed Laws, Acts and Ordinances and implementing, projects under the National Budget, State Investment and National Development Programme, and implementing, monitoring and evaluating subjects and functions of the below-mentioned Departments, State Corporations and Statutory Organizations.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: 02. Special Priorities
texts.text: 02. Special Priorities

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 1. Introducing an appropriate work plan for the prevention of ocean-related environment pollution
texts.text: 1. Introducing an appropriate work plan for the prevention of ocean-related environment pollution

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 2. Adopting measures to prevent sea erosion
texts.text: 2. Adopting measures to prevent sea erosion

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 3. Implementing ocean cleanliness programmes for the prevention of damage caused to the coastal belt and sea bed by the disposal plastic waste
texts.text: 3. Implementing ocean cleanliness programmes for the prevention of damage caused to the coastal belt and sea bed by the disposal plastic waste

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: 03. Related Institutional and Legal Framework
texts.text: 03. Related Institutional and Legal Framework

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (5) '01.  Purview,  02.  Subjects  and  Functions,  03.  Special  Priorities  and  04.  Related    Institutional  and Legal Framework'  under the Heading 'No. 3.0 Minister of Finance'  of  the  said  Notification  is  as follows;
texts.text: (5) '01.  Purview,  02.  Subjects  and  Functions,  03.  Special  Priorities  and  04.  Related    Institutional  and Legal Framework'  under the Heading 'No. 3.0 Minister of Finance'  of  the  said  Notification  is  as follows;

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: 6.0 Minister of Finance
texts.text: 6.0 Minister of Finance

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: 01. Purview
texts.text: 01. Purview

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Responsibilities in relation to macro-economic policies, annual budget and Appropriation Acts, public financial management, local and foreign savings and investments, public debts, banking, finance and insurance activities,  international  financial  cooperation  and  directing  social  security  and  economic development activities.
texts.text: Responsibilities in relation to macro-economic policies, annual budget and Appropriation Acts, public financial management, local and foreign savings and investments, public debts, banking, finance and insurance activities,  international  financial  cooperation  and  directing  social  security  and  economic development activities.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: 02. Subjects and Functions
texts.text: 02. Subjects and Functions

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Providing policy guidance to relevant State Ministries, and formulating policies in relation to the subject of Finance  in conformity with the prescribed Laws, Acts and Ordinances, implementation of projects , under the national budget, state Investment and National Development Programme, and formulating, implementing, monitoring and evaluating policies, programmes and projects, related to subjects and functions under below-mentioned Departments, State Corporations and Statutory Institutions for the creation of a 'People Centric Economy' based on the national policies implemented by the government, and in line with the policy statement 'Vistas of Prosperity and Splendour'.
texts.text: Providing policy guidance to relevant State Ministries, and formulating policies in relation to the subject of Finance  in conformity with the prescribed Laws, Acts and Ordinances, implementation of projects , under the national budget, state Investment and National Development Programme, and formulating, implementing, monitoring and evaluating policies, programmes and projects, related to subjects and functions under below-mentioned Departments, State Corporations and Statutory Institutions for the creation of a 'People Centric Economy' based on the national policies implemented by the government, and in line with the policy statement 'Vistas of Prosperity and Splendour'.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: 03. Special Priorities
texts.text: 03. Special Priorities

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 1. Establishing a sustained, high economic growth rate that distributes benefits to all, covers all provinces, and minimizes income disparities
texts.text: 1. Establishing a sustained, high economic growth rate that distributes benefits to all, covers all provinces, and minimizes income disparities

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 2. Reducing unemployment giving priority to low income earners and increasing per capita income
texts.text: 2. Reducing unemployment giving priority to low income earners and increasing per capita income

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 3. Ensuring price stability by maintaining annual average inflation rate at a low level
texts.text: 3. Ensuring price stability by maintaining annual average inflation rate at a low level

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 4. Reducing uncertainties in public revenue policies by reducing budget deficit and public debt
texts.text: 4. Reducing uncertainties in public revenue policies by reducing budget deficit and public debt

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 5. Expanding financial resources and economic needs by maintaining loan interest rate at a lower level
texts.text: 5. Expanding financial resources and economic needs by maintaining loan interest rate at a lower level

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 6. Stabilizing the interest rates, financial and balance of payment policies in order to ensure that the exchange value of the rupee is maintained at a stable level.
texts.text: 6. Stabilizing the interest rates, financial and balance of payment policies in order to ensure that the exchange value of the rupee is maintained at a stable level.

texts.text: 7. Introducing measures to promote domestic production, empower low-income earners and incentivize investments

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 8. Expanding the business environment for the domestic business community in a manner that would provide benefits to general public.
texts.text: 8. Expanding the business environment for the domestic business community in a manner that would provide benefits to general public.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 9. Strengthening public enterprises.
texts.text: 9. Strengthening public enterprises.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 10. Strengthening the institutional structure required for the efficient management of state revenue and expenditure
texts.text: 10. Strengthening the institutional structure required for the efficient management of state revenue and expenditure

texts.text: (9) By deleting the Heading 'No. 15.1 State Minister of Paddy and Grains,  Organic Food, Vegetables, Fruits, Chilies, Onion and Potato Cultivation Promotion, Seed Production and Advanced Technology Agriculture and '01. Subjects & Functions, 02. Special Priorities and 03. Related  Institutional  and Legal Framework' under thereof in that notification;

texts.text: (10) By deleting the Heading 'No. 15.2 State Minister of Production, Supply and  Regulation of Organic and Natural Fertilizer and '01. Subjects & Functions, 02. Special Priorities and 03. Related Institutional and Legal Framework' under  thereof in that  notification;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (11) 'By insertion of the following new Heading and '01. Subjects and Functions,  02. Special Priorities and 03. Related Institutional and Legal Framework' under  thereof after the Heading  No. '15.0 Minister of Agriculture' in that notification;
texts.text: (11) 'By insertion of the following new Heading and '01. Subjects and Functions,  02. Special Priorities and 03. Related Institutional and Legal Framework' under  thereof after the Heading  No. '15.0 Minister of Agriculture' in that notification;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 15.1 State  Minister  of  Promoting  the  Production  &  Regulating  the  Supply  of      Organic  Fertilizer, and Paddy & Grains, Organic Foods,  Vegetables,  Fruits, Chillies,  Onion and Potato Cultivation Promoting, Seed  Production and Advanced Technology Agriculture
texts.text: 15.1 State  Minister  of  Promoting  the  Production  &  Regulating  the  Supply  of      Organic  Fertilizer, and Paddy & Grains, Organic Foods,  Vegetables,  Fruits, Chillies,  Onion and Potato Cultivation Promoting, Seed  Production and Advanced Technology Agriculture

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: 01. Subjects and Functions
texts.text: 01. Subjects and Functions

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Assisting  in  the  formulation  of  policies  in  relation  to  the  subject  of    Promoting  the  Production  & Regulating the Supply of  Organic Fertilizer, and Paddy & Grains, Organic Foods, Vegetables,  Fruits, Chillies, Onion and Potato Cultivation Promoting, Seed Production and Advanced  Technology Agriculture for 'Incentivizing the use of eco-friendly organic   fertilizer of high standard and agricultural industry of high technology'  under the direction and guidance of the Minister of Agriculture in  conformity with the prescribed Laws, Acts and Ordinances and  implementing, projects under the National Budget, State Investment and  National Development Programme, and implementing, monitoring and  evaluating subjects and functions of the below-mentioned Departments,  State  Corporations  and  Statutory Organizations.
texts.text: Assisting  in  the  formulation  of  policies  in  relation  to  the  subject  of    Promoting  the  Production  & Regulating the Supply of  Organic Fertilizer, and Paddy & Grains, Organic Foods, Vegetables,  Fruits, Chillies, Onion and Potato Cultivation Promoting, Seed Production and Advanced  Technology Agriculture for 'Incentivizing the use of eco-friendly organic   fertilizer of high standard and agricultural industry of high technology'  under the direction and guidance of the Minister of Agriculture in  conformity with the prescribed Laws, Acts and Ordinances and  implementing, projects under the National Budget, State Investment and  National Development Programme, and implementing, monitoring and  evaluating subjects and functions of the below-mentioned Departments,  State  Corporations  and  Statutory Organizations.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: 02. Special  Priorities
texts.text: 02. Special  Priorities

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 1. Formulating methodologies for the timely distribution of technological crop systems, quality seeds, plants and fertilizer of standardized quality for major crops including paddy and grain varieties, pepper, cloves and cocoa as well as vegetable, fruit and home garden crops
texts.text: 1. Formulating methodologies for the timely distribution of technological crop systems, quality seeds, plants and fertilizer of standardized quality for major crops including paddy and grain varieties, pepper, cloves and cocoa as well as vegetable, fruit and home garden crops

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 2. Encouraging local production of organic fertilizer using local materials to international standards and production of other high quality fertilizers within the country
texts.text: 2. Encouraging local production of organic fertilizer using local materials to international standards and production of other high quality fertilizers within the country

texts.label: page_header

texts.label: page_header
texts.orig: 9A
texts.text: 9A

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 3. Implementing a reasonable pricing policy that satisfies  the  local  farmer  and  consumer  and  a  crop diversification programme in co-ordination with all related institutions
texts.text: 3. Implementing a reasonable pricing policy that satisfies  the  local  farmer  and  consumer  and  a  crop diversification programme in co-ordination with all related institutions

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 4. Implementing programmes to encourage the use of organic fertilizer and production of toxin free food
texts.text: 4. Implementing programmes to encourage the use of organic fertilizer and production of toxin free food

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 5. Implementing the programme to develop Samurdhi and low income home gardens to promote the consumption of organic vegetables and fruits at household level
texts.text: 5. Implementing the programme to develop Samurdhi and low income home gardens to promote the consumption of organic vegetables and fruits at household level

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 6. Minimizing the import of dried chilies, maize, soya, green gram and cowpea, onions and potatoes by increasing the domestic production of such crops
texts.text: 6. Minimizing the import of dried chilies, maize, soya, green gram and cowpea, onions and potatoes by increasing the domestic production of such crops

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 7. Implementing a mechanism to provide facilities for storage of surplus production and for value-added product exports
texts.text: 7. Implementing a mechanism to provide facilities for storage of surplus production and for value-added product exports

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 8. Developing crop harvest collecting and processing centres to add value to agricultural produce and export
texts.text: 8. Developing crop harvest collecting and processing centres to add value to agricultural produce and export

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 9. Implementing a programme to promote vegetable and fruit related export product industries
texts.text: 9. Implementing a programme to promote vegetable and fruit related export product industries

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 10. Introducing a domestic seed policy for production of quality seed to international standards
texts.text: 10. Introducing a domestic seed policy for production of quality seed to international standards

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 11. Regulate seed imports within accepted  Sri Lanka Standards certification to ensure the quality of imported seeds
texts.text: 11. Regulate seed imports within accepted  Sri Lanka Standards certification to ensure the quality of imported seeds

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 12. Encouraging the private sector to provide quality seeds and planting materials
texts.text: 12. Encouraging the private sector to provide quality seeds and planting materials

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 13. Introducing high-yielding seed and plant varieties of indigenous genetic quality that are resistant to diseases and climate changes
texts.text: 13. Introducing high-yielding seed and plant varieties of indigenous genetic quality that are resistant to diseases and climate changes

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 14. Developing government farms and seed production farms
texts.text: 14. Developing government farms and seed production farms

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 15. Taking steps to raise awareness among the farmers subsequent to a comprehensive study on groundwater, ground preparations,  selecting  seeds  and  plants,  fertilizing,  pre  and  post-harvest  adopting  latest technological methodologies on a regional basis
texts.text: 15. Taking steps to raise awareness among the farmers subsequent to a comprehensive study on groundwater, ground preparations,  selecting  seeds  and  plants,  fertilizing,  pre  and  post-harvest  adopting  latest technological methodologies on a regional basis

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 16. Directing value added agricultural production by the adoption of  the knowledge, technological equipment, and by utilization of lands and financial contribution for technology-based agriculture
texts.text: 16. Directing value added agricultural production by the adoption of  the knowledge, technological equipment, and by utilization of lands and financial contribution for technology-based agriculture

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 17. Implementing a programme to prevent wastages associated with harvesting, transportation and unloading by the adoption of the latest technical methods in collaboration with the state and private sectors.
texts.text: 17. Implementing a programme to prevent wastages associated with harvesting, transportation and unloading by the adoption of the latest technical methods in collaboration with the state and private sectors.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 18. Maximizing  economic  benefits  of  water  consumption  with  the  introduction  of  high  yielding methodologies by the economical use of water
texts.text: 18. Maximizing  economic  benefits  of  water  consumption  with  the  introduction  of  high  yielding methodologies by the economical use of water

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: 03. Related Institutional and Legal Framework
texts.text: 03. Related Institutional and Legal Framework

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (12) By re-numbering from the Heading No. "15.1 State Minister of Promoting the Production & Regulating the Supply of  Organic Fertilizer, and  Paddy & Grains, Organic Foods, Vegetables, Fruits, Chillies, Onion and Potato Cultivation Promoting, Seed Production and Advanced  Technology  Agriculture" of the said Notification;
texts.text: (12) By re-numbering from the Heading No. "15.1 State Minister of Promoting the Production & Regulating the Supply of  Organic Fertilizer, and  Paddy & Grains, Organic Foods, Vegetables, Fruits, Chillies, Onion and Potato Cultivation Promoting, Seed Production and Advanced  Technology  Agriculture" of the said Notification;

texts.orig: PRINTED AT THE DEPARTMENT OF GOVERNMENT PRINTING,  SRI LANKA.
texts.text: PRINTED AT THE DEPARTMENT OF GOVERNMENT PRINTING,  SRI LANKA.
